name: Kesha's Grillhouse
description:
Hello! Welcome to Kesha's Grillhouse! Here you can take a break from your daily routines. Make that brain juice flow, solve some puzzles and maybe learn something new. At the end of the course, you will be greeted by a nice juicy steak! Yay and don't die.

WASD - movement
E - interact
Mouse - horizontal view
F4 - fullscreen mode
